question: How did Janie learn for the first time in her life that she was not white?
answer: Janie learned she was not white when she was around six years old through a group photograph. A man came by the Washburn property taking pictures, and Shelby (the oldest white boy) told him to photograph all the children together. When the photograph came back about a week later, everyone was pointed out in the picture except for 'a real dark little girl with long hair standing by Eleanor.' Janie could not recognize herself as that dark child and asked 'where is me?' Miss Nellie pointed to the dark girl and said 'Dat's you, Alphabet, don't you know yo' ownself?' (They called Janie 'Alphabet' because so many people had given her different names.) After looking at the picture for a long time and recognizing her dress and hair, Janie exclaimed 'Aw, aw! Ah'm colored!' - realizing for the first time that she was different from the white children she had grown up with.
quote: Ah was wid dem white chillun so much till Ah didn't know Ah wuzn't white till Ah was round six years old. Wouldn't have found it out then, but a man come long takin' pictures and without askin' anybody, Shelby, dat was de oldest boy, he told him to take us. Round a week later de man brought de picture for Mis' Washburn to see and pay him which she did, then give us all a good lickin'. So when we looked at de picture and everybody got pointed out there wasn't nobody left except a real dark little girl with long hair standing by Eleanor. Dat's where Ah wuz s'posed to be, but Ah couldn't recognize dat dark chile as me. So Ah ast, 'where is me? Ah don't see me.' Everybody laughed, even Mr. Washburn. Miss Nellie, de Mama of de chillun who come back home after her husband dead, she pointed to de dark one and said, 'Dat's you, Alphabet, don't you know yo' ownself?' Dey all useter call me Alphabet 'cause so many people had done named me different names. Ah looked at de picture a long time and seen it was mah dress and mah hair so Ah said: 'Aw, aw! Ah'm colored!' Den dey all laughed real hard. But before Ah seen de picture Ah thought Ah wuz just like de rest.
